result.ga: Ar bhain tú taitneamh as an oíche
result.orig: Ar bhain tú taitneamh as an oíche
result.html: Ar bhain tú taitneamh as an oícheDid you enjoy the night?
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃain tú taitneaṁ as an oíċeDid you enjoy the night?

result.ga: Slán leat agus bain sult as an turas
result.orig: Slán leat agus bain sult as an turas
result.html: Slán leat agus bain sult as an turasGood-bye and enjoy the trip.
result.ponchtml: Slán leat agus bain sult as an turasGood-bye and enjoy the trip.

result.eng: I hope that you enjoy your vacation here.
result.ga: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseo
result.orig: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseo
result.html: Tá súil agam go mbainfidh sibh taitneamh as bhur saoire anseoI hope that you enjoy your vacation here.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam go mbainfiḋ siḃ taitneaṁ as ḃur saoire anseoI hope that you enjoy your vacation here.

result.html: Bainim an-sásamh as an iascachI really enjoy fishing.
result.ponchtml: Bainim an-sásaṁ as an iascaċI really enjoy fishing.

result.html: Bainim an-sásamh as an snúcarI enjoy snooker very much.
result.ponchtml: Bainim an-sásaṁ as an snúcarI enjoy snooker very much.

result.eng: I enjoy a good game of poker.
result.ga: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócair
result.orig: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócair
